dev-backend.template: Run the Go backend development server on port 8080 using: cd backend && go run cmd/api/main.go

dev-frontend.template: Run the Next.js frontend development server on port 3000 using: cd frontend && npm run dev

test-backend.template: Run all Go tests with: cd backend && go test ./...

lint-frontend.template: Run Biome linter on frontend code with: cd frontend && npm run lint

format-frontend.template: Format frontend code with Biome using: cd frontend && npm run format

docker-up.template: Start all Docker containers with: docker-compose up -d
